Class Agent¶

Class Agent represents a company’s agent.

class src.entities.agents.Agent.Agent(agent_id, first_name, last_name, birth_date, base, email)[source]¶

Agent class This class is responsible of modeling commercial agents

__init__(agent_id, first_name, last_name, birth_date, base, email)[source]¶

Init method Initialize an Agent object given the following parameters

Parameters:
  • agent_id – Agent ID
  • first_name – First name
  • last_name – Last name
  • birth_date – Birth date
  • base – Base salary
  • email – E-mail
__module__ = 'src.entities.agents.Agent'¶
__str__()[source]¶

String method Allows to print objects in a natural way

Returns:String containing agent’s info
create_sale()[source]¶

Create sale

Allows the agent to generate a new sale and add it to its sales list :return: Sale object

get_age()[source]¶

Get age method Returns the current agent’s age

Returns:Agent’s age
get_agent_id()[source]¶

Get agent ID Return the current agent’s ID

Returns:Agent’s ID
get_base()[source]¶

Get base Returns the agent’s base salary

Returns:Agent’s base salary
get_birth_date()[source]¶

Get birth_date Getter method that returns agent’s birth date

Returns:Agent’s birth date
get_commissions()[source]¶

Get commissions Given an agent and all the sales they have done, this method can return the commissions earned by the agent

Returns:Value representing total earned in commissions
get_email()[source]¶

Get email Returns the email of the agent who calls the method

Returns:Agent’s email
get_name()[source]¶

Get name method Returns the agent’s full name

Returns:Agent’s full name
get_org()[source]¶

Get organization Returns the organization the agent belongs

Returns:Organization object
get_sales()[source]¶

Get sales method Returns a list of the sales made by the agent that calls the method

Returns:List of sales
get_total()[source]¶

Get total allows the agent to get its salary based on the commissions earned and the salary base

Returns:Value representing the total salary
set_agent_id(new_id)[source]¶

Set agent ID Setter for agent’s ID attribute

Parameters:new_id – New ID to be set

Set base method Allows to set the base salary of a given agent

Parameters:base – Base salary
set_birth_date(birth_date)[source]¶

Set birth_date Setter method that can set the agent’s birth date.

Parameters:birth_date – Birth date
set_email(email)[source]¶

Set email This method can replace the email attribute for the given one as a parameter

Parameters:email – New email

Set organization method Allows to set the organization of an given agent

Parameters:org – Organization
